title: Moxibustion: The Warming Therapy Guide
excerpt: Discover how moxa supports circulation, reduces pain, and boosts vitality.
author: Dr. Huang
contentMarkdown:
Moxibustion uses the warmth of burning mugwort to stimulate acupuncture points and improve circulation.

## Who Benefits

- Cold sensitivity
- Chronic pain
- Fatigue and low energy

## What It Feels Like

Most patients describe a gentle, soothing warmth that is deeply relaxing.
